name: Octagon Project
description:
This is a small Arcade Game based on reflects and rythm. You are a small octagon that must survive to infinite enemy projectiles using your shield. To do so, you must move your shield and protect yourself.

You can take up to three hits before losing. There are eight possible difficulties separated in two main game modes: Standard and Rush. Try both with different difficulties to find the one that matches the best for you.

Controls

Use Arrow Keys to move your shield. Simple as that!
